name: GlobalBan
short: Global ban or unban a user.
description: Globally ban or unban a user from all the guilds the bot is in.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not store end user data.
install_msg: Thank you for installing GlobalBan. Load the cog with `[p]load globalban`. Please note that this cog can be API intense and might get your bot rate limited.
author: Noobindahause#2808
